title: Caribbean! (GOG)
description:

Title: CARIBBEAN!
Genre: Role-playing - Action - Historical
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10)
Languages: Text only: English, Ñ€ÑƒÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹
Modes: Single-player
Released: February 20, 2015
Size: 1.1 GB
Company: Snowbird Games / Snowbird Games
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/caribbean

About:
'Caribbean!' is a mix between an economic strategy game and an open-world RPG, set in the pirate era of the XVII centuryâ€™s Caribbean region. The game is based on the significantly improved Mount & Blade: Warband engine.
'Caribbean!' lets you decide your own role and create your own adventure.
Those who crave for battles in jungles, raids on rich cities and capturing enemy ships can choose the path of a pirate and a mercenary who will raise to the top with the help of his own sword.
Those who aren't afraid of the words 'financial planning' can take pleasure in making great deals and expanding their business by choosing the path of a merchant and a business man. Rank and wealth can be achieved any way you like.
Of course, if you're tired of fighting and boarding enemy ships, you can always invest your collected savings in good real estate. Or do it the other way around â€” sell all of your manufactures, buy a nice brig and become a pirate.
Naval battles with controllable ships and boarding fights.
Building and management of commercial property in towns.
Detailed crew and fleet management.
Ranking progression system for military and business options.
Advanced order and control system for armies in land battles.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10,
Processor: Intel Core Duo 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 3600+; 
Memory: 2 GB RAM;
Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 295 or AMD HD 4870; 
DirectX: Version 9.0c; Hard Drive: 2 GB available space; 
Sound Card: Direct X-compatible sound card; 
Mouse, Keyboard
